name: Dump Ntds.dit To Suspicious Location
description: Detects potential abuse of ntdsutil to dump ntds.dit database to a suspicious location
query: (winlog.channel:Application AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ee][Ss][Ee][Nn][Tt]/ AND event.code:325 AND Data:/.*[Nn][Tt][Dd][Ss]\.[Dd][Ii][Tt].*/ AND Data:(/.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Nn][Tt][Dd][Ss]\.[Dd][Ii][Tt].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Application AND winlog.provider_name:ESENT AND event.code:325 AND Data:*ntds.dit* AND Data:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Perflogs\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *\\Appdata\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *C\:\\ntds.dit*))`
